unnormalised: **Home Loan Bonanza: Is Now the Time to Buy?**
normalised: **Home Loan Bonanza: Is Now the Time to Buy?**

unnormalised: Thinking of finally ditching that PG in Bandra and buying your own little slice of Mumbai? Well, lenders are showering potential homebuyers with attractive home loan schemes right now!
normalised: Thinking of finally ditching that P G in Bandra and buying your own little slice of Mumbai? Well, lenders are showering potential home buyers with attractive home loan schemes right now!

unnormalised: HDFC, ICICI Bank, and SBI are all offering competitive interest rates, some dipping below 7% for eligible borrowers. Plus, many are waiving processing fees - saving you a tidy sum upfront. Diwali bonus, anyone?
normalised: H D F C, I C I C I Bank, and S B I are all offering competitive interest rates, some dipping below seven percent for eligible borrowers. Plus, many are waiving processing fees - saving you a tidy sum upfront. Diwali bonus, anyone?

unnormalised: Experts say this could be a good time to enter the market, but remember to do your homework. Check your CIBIL score, compare offers from multiple lenders, and don't get swayed by just the initial low rate. Look at the fine print!
normalised: Experts say this could be a good time to enter the market, but remember to do your homework. Check your C I B I L score, compare offers from multiple lenders, and do not get swayed by just the initial low rate. Look at the fine print!

unnormalised: Heard Mrs. Sharma down the street finalized her loan application on 20/10/2023 – getting a sweet deal apparently. Deadline for some of these offers is 31/12/2023 so hurry! Consult a financial advisor before making any hasty decisions. Attend the property fair at MMRDA grounds at 11:00 hrs on 28/10/2023. They may have more options available. Happy house hunting, folks!
normalised: Heard Missus Sharma down the street finalized her loan application on twentieth October two thousand and twenty three – getting a sweet deal apparently. Deadline for some of these offers is thirty first December two thousand and twenty three so hurry! Consult a financial advisor before making any hasty decisions. Attend the property fair at M M R D A grounds at eleven zero zero hours on twenty eighth October two thousand and twenty three. They may have more options available. Happy house hunting, folks!
